overview: Most recently, Fabien has founded Zo! Creative LLC, a fast growing digital advertising agency specializing in Social Media and Viral Marketing. Prior to that, he was at Global Universal Film Group, a publicly traded company based in the Paramount Studios, as Marketing Director, responsible for Promotions, Licensing and Merchandising across the company’s slate of films. There he launched a range of new offerings for content delivery, sponsorship integration and user interaction through web based applications. Fabien has also held creative & consulting roles at DDB, Fremantle Media & Joseph Magic Media. Prior to business school, Fabien started as a Magic & Dance Performer, won 18 awards for creativity, and produce 7 festivals under his own company, Zo! Entertainment. Fabien is a born entrepreneur and holds a BA in Business & International Marketing from ISC University in Paris.
